text:
I wish there was a way to add to deprecation warnings an extra note.
Particularly to highlight that while the listed code will give identical behavour to before, most of the time you should do this other code.

ChainRulesTestUtils just made the majority of its arguments optional with good defaults that just work.
Sometimes there are good reasons to override those defaults but 99% of code can just delete those inputs and rely on the defaults instead.
